text: @Timcast Because they got caught forcing people to die of COVID-19...put COVIDs into nursing homes, put non-COVIDs in hospital rooms with COVIDs then forced ventilator deaths to get the $39,000 each vent, nurses paid $10K/wk hush money.  Plus almost zero die of COVID-19 naturally anyway.
